name: Siddharth Gelera (reaper)
description: Full Stack developer with 8+ years of experience

sections.title: About Me
sections.content: Software Architect with 8+ years of experience building secure, scalable applications and leading development teams. Proven expertise in system architecture, performance optimization, developer tooling, and open-source contributions. Led teams of 10-15 developers and architected solutions serving 5k+ users with sub-10ms response times
